subject: [YouTrack, Updated] Issue codio-6169: Order of answers should be randomised
text:
Bug was updated by Joel Moss in project Codio at 28 Sep 2015 18:36.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6169 >codio-6169< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6169 > Order of answers should be randomised Created by VeronikaLee  
The correct acronym for the main processor chip in a computer is <<<CPU>>>. It is connected to the system memory by a <<<bus>>>. And memory is usually known as <<<RAM>>>                       
if you choose show answers it will show it in same order CPU - bus - RAM

html:
Bug was updated by Joel Moss in project Codio at 28 Sep 2015 18:36.

codio-6169 Order of answers should be randomised Created by VeronikaLee
The correct acronym for the main processor chip in a computer is <<<CPU>>>. It is connected to the system memory by a <<<bus>>>. And memory is usually known as <<<RAM>>>

if you choose show answers it will show it in same order CPU - bus - RAM
State Current → New
